name: Dig For Your Life - a survival game
name_original: Dig For Your Life - a survival game
description:
• This game was originally made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1. This the ongoing version (with updates).
  • The theme of the jam was: Holes
  • Project started on February 16  for Brackeys GameJam2020.1
  • Made in Unity. 

Much love, Tarzand & DapeachTV.
